page.title: 06SANDWICK SHOPS
page.content: Although Sandwick is a small community, it is well served by the local shops, which cater for most everyday needs. Many families also shop in the largest town in Shetland, Lerwick and also from mobile shops which tour the area with groceries, bread and fish. Many families also use mail-order catalogues for items which are difficult to obtain in Shetland. {The Central Stores, Sandwick. This shop has the following departments : Grocery, Butchery, Hardware, Bakery, and Post Office. Petrol is also sold on the forecourt. {The Bake Shop, Sandwick.} As its name implies, this shop is mainly concerned with making and selling bread abd cakes. However, groceries are also sold in the shop.
